Text: Agreed (two brief edited moments), but would like the uncensored version... BTW, just a terrific start to the new season (albeit a 'tablesetter').

Two brief moments of a black box covering something up sure but also all the swearing cut out too.  It's watchable but I'll be avoiding these in the future and the poster would do well to advise people of this so that they have the choice to wait for an unedited version before getting stuck with this.
